name: Quantum Core
description:
> The CORE has reached quantum state.
> WARNING: enemies are approaching.
> Initiating qBit...

An anomalous electronic system growing in power, hordes of micro-mechanical enemies ready to stop it. 

You, the quantistic bit self-generated into the CPU, will defend the core from the hordes of bots attracted by your energy.
The electronic board will be your battlefield.
How long will you be able to resist against the growing enemy waves? 

QUANTUM CORE is a fast-paced twin-stick-shooter with tower defense elements set on an electronic board. Survive the hordes of enemies for as long as you can using defenses and powers that you build directly on the battlefield

  • Experience a fast-paced action playing as the qBit and shoot your enemies with energy drawn from the system
  • Make the electronic board yours, build components to support your fights, draw energy by capacitors and unlock special attacks
  • Manage your system's energy strategically, choose carefully whether to upgrade your defenses or unleash your power against the enemies
  • Cause as much damage as you can and increase your score before the enemies eventually overwhelm you
  • Shape every game with different strategies and try to beat your best scores!
